Question.Subject: Is there a site that you can make your videos private, but viewable on another site?
Question.Content:
I have a loyal fan base on YouTube that have said they love my videos, So I was thinking about having a website that has all my videos, but is there a website that you can upload videos on, that can be set to private, so you can only see them on my site?
I have tried it with YouTube and it does not work. It would be pointless to have the videos public, so you could see them on YouTube and my site.
Question.ChosenAnswer: You are better off starting your own website. Yahoo has several hosting plans that could work well. This way you can control all of the content and user base.

Answer.Content: You are better off starting your own website. Yahoo has several hosting plans that could work well. This way you can control all of the content and user base.
